tool_description: Identifies and optimizes handover zones between adjacent cells, calculating handover parameters and trigger thresholds for seamless mobility.
error_messages: Site overlap insufficient: Source and target sites must have overlapping coverage areas.
Invalid handover margin: Margin must be between 0-10 dB.
Invalid hysteresis: Hysteresis must be between 0-5 dB.
Handover path blocked: Terrain or buildings block handover between some site pairs.
usage: Specify source and target cell arrays with handover parameters to optimize handover zone boundaries and trigger settings.

trigger_thresholds_dbm.description: Signal level thresholds for handover initiation
